messages.content: Following up: I tried made the next step explicit for the routine you were rebuilding. I got a small win. Can you help me make it decision-ready?

Last time, you were feeling behind around the routine you were rebuilding, with overthinking getting in the way. It is normal for it to feel wobbly after a first attempt. We can make this feel lighter without losing the point. Next step: Pick one anchor step that creates momentum. Do you want one line you can send, or a short paragraph?
